issue.title: Logical camera detects model outside of visualized frustum

content.raw: Looks like the visualization is probably correct, and the logical camera is in error. A little math shows in the attached world the lowest point of the frustum should be about 25cm above the top of the box `target`. There's no way they could intersect.
content.html: Looks like the visualization is probably correct, and the logical camera is in error. A little math shows in the attached world the lowest point of the frustum should be about 25cm above the top of the box target. There's no way they could intersect.
